original_text: And the Lord went his way, as soon as he had left communing with Abraham: and Abraham returned unto his place.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브라함과 말씀을 마치시고 가시니 아브라함도 자기 곳으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord went his way
as soon as he had left communing with Abraham
and Abraham returned unto his place
